result.execSummary:
The defendant Daniel J Grupe was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.
Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.

RELEASING FUNDS - $10.00 to COC and $350.00 to Paul J. Sauer

10:57 a.m.  Defendant present in court with Atty Jon Wilsnack.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Court recites agreement - will pay $350.00 restitution and matter will be amended to Disorderly Conduct.  State concurs.  Atty Wilsnack concurs.  Defendant concurs.

Court goes over plea questionnaire with the defendant.  Court goes over constitutional rights with the defendant - defendant waives these rights.  Court goes over the elements of each offense.  Court instructs defendant of the maximum penalty.  Court instructs defendant regarding deportation. 

Defendant enters a plea of NO CONTEST.  Court finds the plea is made freely, voluntarily, intelligently and understandingly.  Court finds there is a factual basis to support the plea.  Court finds the defendant guilty to count 1 as amended.  Court orders the judgment of conviction be entered here today.  DA confirms compliance with victim witness rights.  No sentencing statement by DA.  No sentencing statement by Atty Wilsnack.  No statement by the defendant.

Court sentences the defendant to:  $100 fine plus costs.  Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.

Court adjourned at 11:02 a.m.
Status hearing at 08-03-2015 10:00 am

2:40 p.m.  No appearance by the defendant.  Attorney Jon Wilsnack present.  Lisa Vanden Branden for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by Atty Wilsnack - sent a proposal to the DA's office and will discuss this matter.  Court will set for status hearing in approx 30 days.

Court adjourned at 2:41 p.m.
Status hearing at 06-23-2015 02:00 pm

2:24 p.m.  Defendant present in court with Atty Jon Wilsnack.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by Atty Wilsnack - was just appointed and will submit an offer to the DA.  Court will set for status hearing on June 23, 2015 at 2:00 p.m. 

Court adjourned at 2:25 p.m.

2:02 p.m.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading.  Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count.  Court finds probable cause.  Court advises regarding DNA and expungement.  Court instructs the defendant of his right to an attorney.  Defendant enters a plea of NOT GUILTY.  DA makes bond recommendation.  Court sets bond at $500.00 signature bond and conditions of:  Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.  Court will set for Status Hearing on April 27, 2015 at 1:00 p.m.
